transcript: Well, come on, we've got to think of something. A year away, it's going to tear us apart. I don't even want to think about it. I don't even know if I'll be able to get in touch with you or...

segments.text: Well, come on, we've got to think of something.
A year away, it's going to tear us apart.
I don't even want to think about it.
I don't even know if I'll be able to get in touch with you or...

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, come on.  You've gotta think of something.  A year--a year away, it's gonna tear us apart.  I don't even--I don't even wanna think about it.  I mean, I don't even know if I'll be able to get in touch with you or--
